title: Provided that, it shall be permissible to utilise the FSI and also the receiving potential of the land under this zone, as otherwise permissible, on the remaining contiguous unaffected land of the same land owner
clause_text: Provided that, it shall be permissible to utilise the FSI and also the receiving potential of the land under this zone, as otherwise permissible, on the remaining contiguous unaffected land of the same land owner.
section: Restriction under the Works of Defence Act, 1903

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
